feed.title: Pividori Lab
feed.subtitle: We are a research laboratory at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. We design advanced machine learning methods applied to human disease with a systems biology approach.

entry.title: Initializing Pividori Lab
entry.content: Officially, today I start as an Assistant Professor and PI of Pividori Lab in the Department of Biomedical Informatics, University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. I won’t write a long post about my feelings, but I’m very excited about this new stage in my career. I invite you to keep an eye on this blog, my Twitter and our GitHub repos for updates about our research and other activities. We are recruiting, so if your interests overlap with our labs’, please reach out!
